description:
This is a large, cozy, conveniently located 2-bedroom apartment just around the corner from Prospect Park. There is easy access to the B and Q trains (one block away), affordable restaurants, and organic market close by. This is a cared for, colorful home decorated with original artwork and plenty of books + tv with basic cable, wifi.

This apartment is nestled in a beautiful up and coming Brooklyn neighborhood. It is a fairly large place, for New York standards, and is set at an excellent price point.

Lefferts Gardens has been listed in the NY Times as one of the city's blossoming new communities. The area is safe, residential, and diverse.
name: Spacious 2-Bedroom Apt Steps From Prospect Park!!!
review: We loved our stay here! The apartment was huge, comfy, and pretty much perfect for our needs! (I think a microwave was the only thing I kind of wished for, but I think I'm just lazy... they're quite bad for you anyway and it was easy to make do without it!) There are tons of shops nearby for groceries, the subway is close, and we were able to park right in front of the apartment for free. I'd absolutely stay here again in the future.
